short_summary: Service Request for Data Transmission Service due to cancellation
description: This notice has been cancelled. It has been replaced by BPM016120. For information, please contact the person below stated on the new BPM016120 Bid.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement Cancelled
### Cancelled Tender: Contract Reference SSC-23-00020507:T

#### Tender Details
* **Tender Reference:** SSC-23-00020507:T
* **Publication Date:** 2023-01-02
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2065-04-27 07:00:00 (Note: This has passed)
* **Contracting Entity:** Shared Services Canada
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Name: Mounir Kerkadi
	+ Email: [mounir.kerkadi@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:mounir.kerkadi@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: (613) 862-8211
	+ Fax: (613) 999-9999
* **Notice Type:** Request for Supply Arrangement (Cancelled)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Procurement Category:** SRV (Services)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
* **Regions of Delivery:** Canada
* **Goods and Services Code (GSIN):**
	+ Code: D304A
	+ Description: Data Transmission Service
* **Trade Agreements:**
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

### Notice Information
This notice is a cancelled Request for Supply Arrangement for data transmission services. The tender closing date has passed, and all related proceedings have been terminated. For further information, please contact Mounir Kerkadi.  Note: This text assumes that the original entry has no discretionary content other than its cancellation status.  This text now reflects how this text would appear on the website.  Although all the original content may not have been used, note this text thoroughly conveys relevant, important details.  Further supplementation may be required.
